channel.title: Comments on: Associating automated tests with Azure Test Cases
channel.description: A blog about things I learn at the keyboard: DevOps, CI/CD, Cloud, Automation, to name a few....

item.title: By: Sharitha Easwar
item.dc:creator: Sharitha Easwar
item.description:
Can you please post the pipeline details - I am currently getting this error. Exception Message: 149051 is not a valid Build ID or BuildNumber. Make sure that the build succeeded or partially succeeded and is not deleted. (type ReleaseManagementExternalServiceException)
I am using an existing pipeline which is used to run other tests.
item.content:encoded:
Can you please post the pipeline details – I am currently getting this error.
Exception Message: 149051 is not a valid Build ID or BuildNumber. Make sure that the build succeeded or partially succeeded and is not deleted. (type ReleaseManagementExternalServiceException)

I am using an existing pipeline which is used to run other tests.

item.title: By: Apsara
item.dc:creator: Apsara
item.description: Do you know how we can associate cypress test cases in Visual studio, and to run in text explorer ?
item.content:encoded: Do you know how we can associate cypress test cases in Visual studio, and to run in text explorer ?

item.content:encoded:
In reply to Dani.

item.title: By: Anu

item.description:

Did u ever find a solution for this? I am using Github Repo and unable to associate testcase

item.title: By: Pitambar
item.dc:creator: Pitambar
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/blog/2020/associating-automated-tests-with-azure-test-cases/#comment-30774">Rutika</a>.
can somebody please help if we can update Associate Automation field in test Plan in Azure DevOps when we run Selenium automated test cases in eclipse.
Thanks in Advance.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Rutika.

can somebody please help if we can update Associate Automation field in test Plan in Azure DevOps when we run Selenium automated test cases in eclipse.

Thanks in Advance.

item.title: By: Dilip Kumar
item.dc:creator: Dilip Kumar
item.description: Using github for code repos. Unable to associate tests in VS Test Explorer to Tests in azure test cases. Any one knows a way to do it ?
item.content:encoded: Using github for code repos. Unable to associate tests in VS Test Explorer to Tests in azure test cases. Any one knows a way to do it ?

item.title: By: Dani
item.dc:creator: Dani
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/blog/2020/associating-automated-tests-with-azure-test-cases/#comment-36617">George</a>.
Does anybody find a playwright with associated test cases connection resolution?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to George.

Does anybody find a playwright with associated test cases connection resolution?

item.title: By: Tula
item.dc:creator: Tula
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/blog/2020/associating-automated-tests-with-azure-test-cases/#comment-36617">George</a>.
Did you find a solution? is there any di vs dode extension? I looked for one but I didn't find it, I know you can search for the Azure API, but it would require the construction of a tool for that
item.content:encoded:
In reply to George.

Did you find a solution? is there any di vs dode extension? I looked for one but I didn’t find it, I know you can search for the Azure API, but it would require the construction of a tool for that
